Class DocumentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lt.vtmc.documents.controller.DocumentController

public class DocumentController
extends Object
    Controller for managing documents.

      • createDocument

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doc/create")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createDocument(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                       CreateDocumentCommand command)
        Creates document with specified fields.
        Parameters:
        command - CreateDocumentCommand type JSON containing document name, author username, description and document type.
        Returns:
        UID document unique identification number

      • addFiles

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(value="/api/doc/upload/{UID}")
public void addFiles(@PathVariable(value="UID")
                                                                                                             String UID,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="files")
                                                                                                             org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files)
        Uploads files to database and adds the to existing document
        Parameters:
        UID - unique identification number
        files - files in MultipartFile[] format

      • findDocument

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(path="/api/doc/{UID}")
public DocumentDetailsDTO findDocument(@PathVariable(value="UID")
                                                                                                                      String UID)
        Finds one specific document by UID
        Parameters:
        UID - unique identification number
        Returns:
        DocumentDetailsDTO a structurised version of document object without recursions

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updateDocument

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doc/update{UID}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateDocument(@PathVariable(value="UID")
                                                                                                                                                            String UID,
                                                                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                            UpdateDocumentCommand command)
        Updates document details
        Parameters:
        UID - unique document id
        command - containing new name, new description, new document type and file list to remove
        Returns:
        response entity of action status

      • returnAllSubmittedDocuments

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doc/allsubmitted/{username}")
public Map<String,Object> returnAllSubmittedDocuments(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                                                        String username,
                                                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                        PagingData pagingData)
        Returns all submitted documents for the specified user
        Parameters:
        username - users unique username
        pagingData - to set amount of items per page, search phrase and sorting order
        Returns:
        allSubmittedDocuments and paging info for the table

      • removeDocByUser

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @DeleteMapping(value="/api/doc/byUser/{uid}")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeDocByUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                String uid)
        Remove document by document unique id if it belongs to a user that is sending this request.
        Parameters:
        uid - documents unique identification number
        Returns:
        response status describing outcome
